metadata.Title: CVE-2021-45342 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.Description: A buffer overflow vulnerability in CDataList of the jwwlib component of LibreCAD 2.2.0-rc3 and older allows an attacker to achieve Remote Code Execution using a crafted JWW document.

notes.Note: eslerm> any jww file would not load

criterions.comment: librecad package in impish is affected and needs fixing.
